title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 511-2.12 - Medicaid Reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 511-2.12 - Medicaid Reimbursement

State Regulations

Reimbursement for children's behavioral health and health
services must be in accordance with the rates established by the Department of

Health and approved by the Director of the Division of Budget. The rates can be
found on the New York State Department of Health website. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
§§
511-2.12

Adopted

New

York State Register July 17, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 29, eff. 7/17/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
